article_title: Steve Forbes on Donald Trump and His ‘Hoo-Ha’
article_text:
This Guy Will Make $100,000 If Donald Trump Wins the White House

When the pundits were writing Donald Trump off last summer, John Mappin was placing his bets, suspecting something was going on in America most were overlooking.

article_metadata.description: Steve Forbes isn't running for president this time around but he does have a lot to say about the 2016 election and its leading figure, Donald Trump.
article_metadata.author: Jeremy Greenfield
